VICK NOT PARTYING: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as host of a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Michael Vick spent 18 months in prison on federal charges of running a dogfighting ring. the proposal. Mr Sergio Marchionne praised the Mirafiori workers for voting in favour of the labour reforms. He said they were standing up against "decline" and "extremism". Italian leaders and unionists had said that the result of the Mirafiori vote had implications far beyond the limits of Turin.
